description: a(n)^3 is smallest cube containing exactly n 0's.
comments: a(n) is the index of the first occurrence of n in A269250.-- Is there an index n = 3k+1 or n = 3k+2 from which on the pattern a(3k+1) = 16*10^k resp. a(3k+2) = 52*10^k is no more true? - _M. F. Hasler_, Feb 20 2016
links: Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Cubic Number
author: _Patrick De Geest_, Mar 15 1999
